title: Is structuralism or post-structuralism true? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have absolutely no idea what either of them is, but why on earth do you think one of them has to be true? Is it likely? Western philosophy comes up with new -isms every week. Why is it definitely one of these two that's the correct one? "False dichotomy" might be a more important concept than either of these.
